opis: Thomas Dartingo is a certified personal trainer with over 10 years of experience in the fitness industry. He specializes in strength training, weight loss, and functional movement.
Samantha Jones is a former professional athlete turned personal trainer. She has a background in track and field and specializes in speed and agility training.

David Smith is a certified nutritionist and fitness coach with a focus on holistic health and wellness. He helps clients improve their eating habits, manage their weight, and enhance their overall quality of life.
Emily Brown is a physical therapist and strength coach with a background in sports rehabilitation. She specializes in injury prevention, post-rehabilitation training, and functional movement.
